name: Poc Exploration
description:
Hello world,

I’m Angelko and i’m french (so my english is bad)

I worked on a little mobile game built with Phaser.js and Angular.

Now, it’s just a prototype. I implement some mechanisms. I try to abstract Phaser to create my own classes and help me to create games in fullstack JS.

I will surely share my work in open source.

If you want to test this prototype, you need to run on mobile because actions are implemented with touch events.

I need feedback and encouragement.
